the

 but the new RWS book calls it "connectedness."  That's even

>

Only problem is that like REST, you can't google specifically for
"=
connectedness" in the RESTful sense. (REST and connectedness in a
google se=
arch gets 782K hits.

I've been using HEAS (Hypermedia as the Engine of App=
lication State)
with some success. Easier to pronounce than HDAS. But HEAS =
is already an
acronym for some stuff (gets 344K google hits). BTW, HDAS get=
s 74K
google hits.

It would be nice if we are going to use an acronym, it =
be somewhat
unique. But I agree that the "hate" in HATEOAS is a non-starter=
. How
about HMEAS (HyperMedia as the Engine of Application State). REST+HME=
AS
currently only gets 36 hits!

I'm going to start using HMEAS!

-- Nick
